author: Nuno Luis
comment: Doesn't update, often system is armed/unarmed and says the opposite. Takes forever to change status via the app.

reply.author: Prosegur
reply.content: Hola, si tiene alguna incidencia o problema con el uso de la aplicación puede enviarnos un correo a gestiondeclientes@prosegur.com facilitándonos un numero de teléfono junto a los detalles de su situación.

author: Luís Teixeira
comment: To slow APP

author: Colin Pagram
comment: Excellent and easy to navigate around the application

comment: Works pretty well. Could improve some features but it's quite ok.
Lots of bugs and very slow to execute actions.

author: María del Pilar Martí Téllez
comment: Muchos problemas para q funcione bien, si la cobertura del plan de datos no es muy buena, cualquier opcion q uno solicite siempre genera error o se recibe un mensaje q no coincide con la realidad como por ejemplo haber desactivado la alarma y no ser cierto

author: María A.
comment: Falta poder armar otro armado parcial.

reply.author: Prosegur
reply.content: Tenemos en cuenta tu comentario para próximas actualizaciones. Gracias

author: Raymond TINTINGER
comment: It is a superb alarm-system which works extremely precisely. Bravo to all the staff.

author: Sanya A
comment: Make export option working and is perfect

author: Hugo Leitão
comment: Features are limited, some errors, UI it's not very intuitive
muito bom alarme estou muito contente

author: Amigo trabajo
comment: Falla continuamente . Cuando más lo necesitas da error. Sigo esperando a un técnico . Sigue sin funcionar . Horrible

title: Não funciona.

author: TONY2RUN
comment: It took about 3days after alarms were installed to work. It worked for 3 day ok . Only able to see alarms were on.  Could not request images, kept coming up with request failed. Now it comes up with username unknown. I have  contacted prosegur every day via email, phone. no real help always saying they will call back. :what a joke. They  also say the system has just gone down . Try in a little while. It has now bee a week and a 1/2. And I still no joy. Very frustrating. Going to Cancel my contact
